tasks.task: Organize post-instruction cleanup equipment and supplies.
subtasks: Create a general cleaning checklist.
Include extension ladder and step ladder in the list.
Add backpack vacuum or handheld vacuum to the list.
Mention dustpan and broom as essential tools.
Suggest using a tote for storing cleaning supplies.
List chemicals like toothbrush and grout brush.
Prepare a hard floor care checklist.
Recommend floor machines (rotary or cylindrical).
Include brush drives for floor maintenance.
Suggest 1200 psi extractor for ceramic tile and grout care.
Include neutral pH floor cleaner and floor finish in the supplies.
Develop a carpet care checklist.
Mention three-gallon pump sprayer for floor strippers.
Include carpet spotting kit with chemicals and a spotting chart.
Create a window cleaning checklist.
Recommend window cleaning bucket and hip bucket on a belt.
List extension poles, T-bar applicator, and adjustable offset adapter.
Suggest dish soap, microfiber cloth, chamois, sea foam sponge.
Include four-hot steel wool and hard water remover.
Recommend lint-free gloves and microfiber pads for telescopic handles.
